home.hero_title:
Launch your premium blog
in minutes, not months.
home.hero_desc: The ultimate SaaS-ready blog template. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and Supabase. Optimized for SEO, performance, and conversion.
home.features_desc: We've handled the hard parts so you can focus on creating content.
home.template_desc: Start with a professionally designed template and customize it to match your brand.
home.cta_desc: Join thousands of developers and writers who are building the future with Lumina.
home.feature_fast_desc: Optimized for Core Web Vitals with perfect Lighthouse scores.
home.feature_seo_desc: Built-in meta tags, sitemap generation, and semantic HTML.
home.feature_design_desc: Beautifully crafted components with dark mode support.
home.feature_responsive_desc: Looks perfect on mobile, tablet, and desktop devices.
home.feature_stack_desc: Built with React 19, Tailwind v4, and TypeScript.
home.feature_edge_desc: Deploy anywhere. Compatible with Vercel, Netlify, and more.

blog.post1_title: Building Scalable SaaS Applications with React and Supabase
blog.post1_excerpt: Learn how to architect your next SaaS product for scale using the power of React server components and Supabase real-time features.
blog.post2_title: The Ultimate Guide to Modern CSS Layouts
blog.post2_excerpt: Master Grid, Flexbox, and Container Queries to create responsive, robust layouts that work across all devices.
blog.post3_title: Optimizing Web Performance for Core Web Vitals
blog.post3_excerpt: A deep dive into measuring and improving LCP, FID, and CLS to boost your search rankings and user experience.
blog.post4_title: Why TypeScript is Essential for Large Scale Projects
blog.post4_excerpt: Discover how static typing can save you hours of debugging and improve code maintainability in enterprise applications.
blog.post5_title: Designing for Accessibility: A Practical Guide
blog.post5_excerpt: Ensure your web applications are usable by everyone. Learn about ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, and color contrast.
blog.post6_title: State Management in 2025: What to Choose?
blog.post6_excerpt: Comparing Redux Toolkit, Zustand, Jotai, and React Context. Which one is right for your next project?
blog.featured_title: The Future of Web Development: What to Expect in 2025
blog.featured_excerpt: Explore the emerging technologies and methodologies that are shaping the next generation of web applications, from AI-driven development to edge computing.
blog.newsletter_desc: Get the latest articles, tutorials, and updates delivered straight to your inbox. No spam, unsubscribe at any time.
